speaker: Narrator
content: Once upon a time in a land far away there lived a young girl.

speaker: Narrator
content: She had bright red hair and a curious spirit.

speaker: Narrator
content: Every day she would explore the forest behind her cottage.

speaker: Narrator
content: One morning she discovered a hidden path she had never seen before.

speaker: Narrator
content: The path was covered in golden leaves that seemed to glow.

speaker: Narrator
content: She followed it deeper and deeper into the woods.

speaker: Narrator
content: At the end of the path she found a clearing with a crystal clear pond.

speaker: Narrator
content: And sitting by the pond was the most unusual creature she had ever seen.
